text: James Vernon may refer to: *James Vernon (1646–1727), English politician *James Vernon the Younger (1677–1756), British diplomat, civil servant, and briefly a Member of Parliament *James Vernon (chemist) (1910–2000), Australian industrial chemist, Director of CSR (Colonial Sugar Refining Company) 1958–82 *James Vernon (historian), late 20th century British historian *Jim Vernon, Scottish footballer
title: James Vernon (disambiguation)
